articles.title: Greetings to Lithuanian foreign minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Lithuanian foreign minister 
    Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Paek Nam Sun, foreign minister of the DPRK, sent a message of greetings to Lithuanian foreign minister Anthanas Balionis on the occasion of its national day.
 The message expressed the belief that the relations between the two countries would develop on good terms in the new century in the interests of the peoples of the two countries.

articles.title: Congratulatory message to Kim Jong Il from Chongryon CSC
Congratulatory message to Kim Jong Il from CC of NDFSK
First camping at Jangjasan Children's Camp
articles.content:
First camping at Jangjasan Children's Camp
    Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- The first camping of this year started at the Jangjasan Children's Camp in Jagang province on the occasion of the February holiday.
 During their camping schoolchildren will make a march through a snowy road and mountaineering and conduct sports and artistic activities.    
 A ceremony for receiving the first batch of campers took place on February 16.

articles.title: Complete collection of Kim Il Sung's works vol. 35 published
articles.content:
Complete collection of Kim Il Sung's works vol. 35 published
    Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House brought out complete collection of Kim Il Sung's works vol. 35, a library of the immortal Juche idea which carries works of President Kim Il Sung systematically and all-roundly in chronological order.
 The volume contains 23 famous works -- reports, speeches, concluding remarks, lectures and talks -- which were delivered by Kim Il Sung between March and October Juche 54 (1965).    
 The volume includes his ideas, theories and policies to further strengthen our revolutionary forces in political, economic and military aspects and step up the cause of national reunification and the world revolutionary movement.

articles.title: Congratulatory letters to Kim Jong Il from foreign figure skating groups
articles.content:
Congratulatory letters to Kim Jong Il from foreign figure skating groups
    Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received congratulatory letters from foreign figure skating groups participating in the tenth international figure skating festival for paektusan cup on the occasion of his birthday.
 The letters were conveyed to an official concerned by heads of figure skating groups from Russia, China, Ukraine, Belarus, Britain, the Czech Repubic and France.

articles.title: Exhibition performance of synchronized swimming given
Korean art troupe from Japan performs
President Kim Yong Nam meets leading members of Korean art troupe in Japan
articles.content:
President Kim Yong Nam meets leading members of Korean art troupe in Japan
    Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, on Feb. 16 met and conversed with leading members and principal actors and actresses of the Korean art troupe in Japan for celebrating the February holiday.
 On hand were Kim Yong Sun, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Yong Dae, chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party, and Ryu Mi Yong, chairwoman of the Central Committee of the Korean Chondoist Chongu Party.
